text: State unemployment rates in March ranged from 2.2% in North Dakota to 6.9% in Louisiana.
In March, average private-sector weekly earnings ranged from MS’s $772 to DC’s $1,728.
COVID-19 upended historic low unemployment rates in states like NY and WA.
Illinois was one of 17 states that saw private employment decline over the year.
Twelve states saw a year-over-year decline in state and local public employment in March.
Illinois’s annual house price growth has trailed the US average each quarter since 2009.
Texas and six other states saw a year-over-year decline in GDP from Q4 2019 to Q4 2019.
